column5: I am fairly new to this site and have noticed a few pics and stuff with people wearing or having OFC stuff.Is this stuff available to all members or how do I go about finding out what is available and how do I get my hands on some???http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/style_emoticons/default/blink.gif http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/style_e...fault/blink.gif
Thanks Gerritt now I can spend some hard earned money in a good place.Thanks again !!  :thumbsup_anim:
